movies.title: Scarecrow
movies.plot: A high school outcast who lives in a trailer with his mother finally meets a friend. He wants to ask her if they can go the next step, but then sees her kissing another boy at a party. He runs home only to find his mother having sex with a drunk. He starts yelling, but is countered by the drunk when he suffocates him and makes him look like he hung himself. The scarecrow comes in when the boy's soul is pushed into it. He goes out for revenge.
movies.simplePlot: A high school outcast who lives in a trailer with his mother finally meets a friend. He wants to ask her if they can go the next step, but then sees her kissing another boy at a party. He ...

biography.bio: Tim Young is an actor, known for Scarecrow (2002), Little Nicky (2000) and Camp Blood (2000).
biography.name: Tim Young

biography.bio: Todd Rex is known for his work on Interstellar (2014), Guardians of the Galaxy (2014) and Thor (2011).
biography.name: Todd Rex

biography.placeOfBirth: New York City, New York, USA
biography.bio: Tiffany Shepis born and raised in NYC. She got her start in James Gunn (Guardians of the Galaxy)Tromeo and Juliet when she was just 16 years old. Since then Tiffany has made over 100 independent films. Most notably the SYFY hit Abominable, the late night fan favorite The Hazing, After dark horror fests Nightmare Man, Sundance' The Violent Kind, as well as The multi award winning The Frankenstein Syndrome and the mega cult hit Sharknado 2! Tiffany continues to work as an actress, host and producer and is constantly on fan favorite lists such as Playboys top sexiest scream queens.
biography.name: Tiffany Shepis

biography.bio: Jen Richey is an actress, known for Scarecrow (2002), A.P.U.: Art, Pot and Underwear (2003) and Saved by the Bell: The New Class (1993).
biography.name: Jen Richey

biography.bio: Roxanna Bina was born in Baltimore, Maryland. She was raised in Michigan and Rhode Island. She attended Rhode Island College and graduated in 2000 with a degree in Communications, Biology and Theater. Roxanna started modeling at the age of 17 in New York, Boston and Providence. She also starred in an MTV commercial, as well as a horror movie called 'Scarecrow' (with a cult following).After designing several collections under her label 'Roxanna Bina Couture' and 'Mooshibear', Roxanna turned to writing freelance for several magazines. She was the fashion editor at Buzzine.com and also has a fashion blog called 'Teacups and Couture', which focuses on unusual fashion from emerging designers and artists. In addition to being a writer, she also covers movie junkets as a international television journalist for the French territory on a regular basis. You may see her interviews on You Tube. Roxanna resides in California. She has 3 sons and 4 cats.
biography.name: Roxanna Bina

biography.bio: John Moore is a producer and writer, known for Abortion, Corruption and Cops: The Bertram Wainer Story (2006), The Trial (2009) and Menzies and Churchill at War (2008).
biography.name: John Moore

biography.bio: Richard grew up in the Crenshaw district of Los Angeles (Boyz n the Hood (1991)), was a semi-professional boxer, food and wine critic and successful stage director. He is also a noted Afro-Latin percussionist and the founder of the original Mystic Knights of the Oingo-Boingo. Richard's first novel, "The Schlemazl of Sebriem" will be published later this year.
biography.name: Richard Elfman

biography.bio: Jason Simon is an actor, known for Scarecrow (2002).
biography.name: Jason Simon

biography.bio: Mark Irvingsen is an actor and producer, known for Hold Up (2004), Falsehood (2001) and Finding Normal (2013).
biography.name: Mark Irvingsen

biography.bio: Belinda Gavin is known for her work on American Gladiators (2008), Bad Bizness (2003) and Children's Entertainment Program Safe Cool Kats the Video (2016).

biography.bio: Sonja Ecker is an actress, known for Scarecrow (2002), That Darn Punk (2001) and V.R. Troopers (1994).
biography.name: Sonja Ecker

biography.bio: Derrick Bishop is an actor and writer, known for Filth to Ashes, Flesh to Dust (2011), Hood Angels (2003) and Scarecrow (2002).
biography.name: Derrick Bishop

biography.bio: Anthony C. Ferrante is a director and writer, known for Sharknado (2013), Boo (2005) and Sharknado 2: The Second One (2014).
biography.name: Anthony C. Ferrante

biography.bio: Skyler Caleb was born on July 25, 1981 in Visalia, California, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Waking (2013), Vlog (2008) and Awaken the Shadowman (2017).
biography.name: Skyler Caleb

biography.bio: Anil de Mello was born in Geneva, Switzerland. He is an actor, known for Scarecrow (2002).
biography.name: Anil de Mello
